New Records: Freddie Freeman hit the first walk-off grand slam in World Series history
Key Match Events: Freddie Freeman hit a walk-off grand slam in the 10th inning
Jazz Chisholm manufactured a go-ahead run in the 10th inning for the Yankees
Shohei Ohtani got his first World Series hit and scored the tying run for the Dodgers
Giancarlo Stanton hit a go-ahead home run in the sixth inning for the Yankees
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Judge said Shohei Ohtani is the 'best player in the game'
Johnny Damon believes the Yankees will need to use their lineup's depth to beat the Dodgers
Dave Roberts said there is no possibility of Shohei Ohtani pitching against the Yankees in the World Series
Post-Match Reflections: Dave Roberts described the moment when he heard the walk-off grand slam off Freddie Freeman's bat as 'the greatest baseball moment I've ever witnessed'
Freddie Freeman talked about his walk-off grand slam in Game 1 of the World Series against the Yankees
Aaron Judge discussed the Yankees' loss to the Dodgers in the bottom of the 10th inning of Game 1 of the World Series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers will honor the late Fernando Valenzuela with a uniform patch during the World Series
Taylor Trammell, the only major leaguer who played for both the Dodgers and Yankees this season, is guaranteed a 2024 World Series ring
The city of Los Angeles is preparing for traffic trouble on Friday night amid several sporting events
